title: Understanding the Importance of Centering
text: Centering a title or important information in a worksheet can enhance its visual appeal and readability. It helps in drawing attention to the key information.

title: Professional Appearance
text: A well-organized worksheet with centered titles can make the document look more professional and polished.

hintAnswer: It helps the worksheet look more professional
title: Choosing the Best Reason
text: Which of the following reasons best explains why centering a title is important?
choices: It helps the worksheet look more professional
It allows us to navigate the worksheet better
